title: Harder General Knowledge Quiz 2 (50 Questions)
description: Challenging but fair mix of pop culture, history, science, geography, and technology.

items.q: What year did The Simpsons first air on television?
Who played Forrest Gump?
What author wrote The Lord of the Rings?
What TV series featured a chemistry teacher who becomes a meth cook?
Which Beatle was the last to join the band?
What Disney film introduced the song 'Let It Go'?
Who directed Pulp Fiction?
What movie features the line 'Here’s looking at you, kid'?
Which band released the album Dark Side of the Moon?
What fictional detective lives at 221B Baker Street?
In which year did the Berlin Wall go up?
Who was the first emperor of China?
The Cold War was mainly between the U.S. and which other superpower?
What year did the Titanic sink?
Who was the U.S. president during the Louisiana Purchase?
Which country did the U.S. invade in 2003?
Who was the British monarch before Queen Elizabeth II?
Which U.S. state was the last to join the Union?
Who was assassinated on the Ides of March, 44 BC?
Which French military leader became emperor in 1804?
How many chambers are in the human heart?
What is the powerhouse of the cell?
What is the most abundant element in the universe?
Which planet has the most moons?
What blood type is the universal donor?
How many pairs of chromosomes do humans have?
What is the process plants use to convert sunlight into energy?
Which scientist proposed the theory of evolution by natural selection?
What is the largest internal organ in the human body?
Which planet has the Great Red Spot?
What is the capital of Brazil?
Which country is nicknamed the Land of the Rising Sun?
What is the largest desert on Earth?
Which city hosted the 2008 Summer Olympics?
What is the longest mountain range in the world?
Which sea is the saltiest on Earth?
What U.S. state is known as the 'Sunshine State'?
What European country has the city of Dubrovnik?
Which continent is Madagascar closest to?
What is the capital of Iceland?
What does RAM stand for in computers?
What year was Facebook founded?
What company invented the PlayStation?
What is Elon Musk’s aerospace company called?
What does CPU stand for?
What company developed the first commercial jetliner, the 707?
What is the name of Apple’s virtual assistant?
Who founded Amazon?
What does PDF stand for?
What year was Windows 95 released?
